body_html: The main advantage of the model_to_estimator is that we can skip the implementation of the model_fn. Writing the pure model_fn is not convenient for who uses the keras model and model_to_estimator to get the estimator. If adding just a summary or warm start an estimator will require an explicit model_fn manually defined the scope of model_to_estimator will be too narrow.

body: The main advantage of the model_to_estimator is that we can skip the implementation of the model_fn. Writing the pure model_fn is not convenient for who uses the keras model and model_to_estimator to get the estimator. If adding just a summary or warm start an estimator will require an explicit model_fn manually defined the scope of model_to_estimator will be too narrow.
